HeroSubtitle: Buld by a 2nd-year Information Science Engineering undergrad, I thrive as a Front-End Developer, notably contributing to Cisco ThingQBator where I built a responsive website for Project Shield. My innovative projects, like the Real-Time Stock Trading Simulation and Customized Mass Email Sender, showcase my expertise in web development. With a strong academic record and coding contest victories, I am passionate about crafting seamless and engaging user experiences.
AboutDescription: I'm excited to share a bit about myself with you. Thanks for showing interest! Below, you'll find a glimpse into my journey, experiences, and passion for coding. Feel free to explore, and if you have any questions or just want to connect, I'm all ears.
AboutMainDescription: Having ventured into Frontend, Backend, and UI/UX design realms, akin to the versatile All Rounders in cricket who excel in both bowling and batting, I embrace the title of a Full Stack developer with a distinct flair for Frontend intricacies üòÅ
AboutOtherDescription: Delving into the tech world, I've worn multiple hats ‚Äì from being an active volunteer at IEEE to currently being a part of the Executive team at Google Developer Student Clubs (GDSC). It's not just about the code for me; it's about community and collaboration. Excitingly, I've been recommended by the Service Selection Board (SSB) for Officer entry in the Indian Navy, a testament to my teamwork and leadership skills.
ProjectDescription: Following are some of the exciting endeavors I've embarked on. Each project reflects my dedication to coding and creating meaningful digital experiences. Take a tour, and if you're curious or have any thoughts to share, feel free to reach out.

projectDetails.projectName: Trading Arena - Real Time Stock Trading Simulation / Stocks Playground
projectDetails.projectDescription: Users can browse live stocks as per National stock exchange - India, when ever a user completes his/her signup he is credited Rs 1lac (virtual currency) and the user can use this virtual curreny to buy stocks, whenever the user sells the stocks, the amount credited is as per the latest stock prices.

projectDetails.projectName: Digital Clinic - A Web App Addressing Mental Health Issues
projectDetails.projectDescription: Application Offers Mental Health Assessment, Social Media & Articles Summariser, Articles on imporving mental health & digital Wellbeing, Community Articles with edit and delete Functionality by the creator, Online Counselling or meetup Sessions Scheduler, with edit and delete Functionality by the creator, Admin Panel, Track Login history.

Built an visually appealling Event website, where visitors could know more about the hackathon and also register for the same, increased the number of registrations by 30% as compared to the previous year.
projectDetails.projectName: Event Website for CodeFury 6.0 - Annual National Level Hackathon

projectDetails.projectDescription: My Personal Portfolio, where you can know more about myself, my skills, my projects, what I do and contact me.

projectDetails.projectName: Mass Email Sender - A Web App for sending customized mass emails
projectDetails.projectDescription:
Developed a Responsive web application where organisations can send customised mass mails in text and html format directly from a CSV file.
 ‚Ä¢ Reduced the time to send mass emails by 400% per email.

projectDetails.projectName: Modern Furniture Store Frontend - A Web App for a Furniture Store
projectDetails.projectDescription: A Modern Furniture store, with Animations and over 10 pages with modern design with Parallax effect and a fully responsive design, with multiple components, contact form and a newsletter subscription form.
